languages.text: "На вашем месте я бы переживал не о кощунстве, а о том, в каких менее святотатственных местах они могут скрываться еще".
"If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."
languages.original_text: "На вашем месте я бы переживал не о кощунстве, а о том, в каких менее святотатственных местах они могут скрываться еще".

traits.locale_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and perhaps more concerned about where else they could be hiding."
"If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and perhaps more concerned about where else they could be hiding."
"If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more worried about where else they might be hiding."
"If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more worried about where else they might be hiding."
"If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."
"If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."
"If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."

languages.text: "Ich an Eurer Stelle würde mich weniger um die Entweihung sorgen und mehr darüber, wo sonst sie sich versteckt halten könnten."
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."

traits.locale_text: "Ich an Eurer Stelle würde mich weniger um die Entweihung sorgen und mehr darüber, wo sonst sie sich versteckt halten könnten."

languages.text: « À votre place, ce n'est pas la profanation qui m'inquiéterait le plus, mais le fait que d'autres se cachent peut-être encore parmi nous. »
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."

traits.locale_text: « À votre place, ce n'est pas la profanation qui m'inquiéterait le plus, mais le fait que d'autres se cachent peut-être encore parmi nous. »

languages.text: «En su lugar, me preocuparía menos por la profanación y más por descubrir dónde más se esconden».
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."

traits.locale_text: «En su lugar, me preocuparía menos por la profanación y más por descubrir dónde más se esconden».

languages.text: 「もし私がお前だったら、冒涜を心配するよりも、彼らが他にどこに隠れているのか心配するだろうな」
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."

traits.locale_text: 「もし私がお前だったら、冒涜を心配するよりも、彼らが他にどこに隠れているのか心配するだろうな」

languages.text: “如果我是你，我可能不会那么在意亵渎的事情，而会更关心他们可能藏在什么地方。”
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."

traits.locale_text: “如果我是你，我可能不会那么在意亵渎的事情，而会更关心他们可能藏在什么地方。”

languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."

languages.text: "Senin yerinde olsam hürmetsizliklerine endişelenmekten ziyade nerede saklandıkları konusunda endişelenirdim."
languages.original_text: "If I were you, I would be less concerned about the desecration and more concerned about where else they might be hiding."
